branchCategory.name: 100 Series
branchCategory.description: The new VM100/200 series is now more lightweight and compact than the conventional model. The series has a variety of actuator types to choose from.  Also, with piping options of side ported and bottom ported, it is now possible to choose the mounting method with the side ported.

branchItem.name: VM100, 100 Series 2/3 Port Mechanical Valve, New
branchItem.description: The new VM100/200 series is now more lightweight and compact than the conventional model. The series has a variety of actuator types to choose from.  Also, with piping options of side ported and bottom ported, it is now possible to choose the mounting method with the side ported.

branchItem.name: VM100F, 2/3 Port Mechanical Valve w/One-touch Fitting
branchItem.description: The new VM100/200 series is now more lightweight and compact than the conventional model. The series has a variety of actuator types to choose from.  Also, with piping options of side ported and bottom ported, it is now possible to choose the mounting method with the side ported.
